Package tellolib.control

Interface TelloControlInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TelloControl
    public interface TelloControlInterface
    Higher level interface to Tello Drone library.

    • Method Detail

      • setLogLevel

        void setLogLevel​(java.util.logging.Level logLevel)
        set logging level. Defaults to OFF.
        Parameters:
        logLevel - Desired log level. Level.SEVERE: a serious failure, which prevents normal execution of the program, for end users and system administrators. Level.WARNING: a potential problem, for end users and system administrators. Level.INFO: reasonably significant informational message for end users and system administrators. Level.CONFIG: hardware configuration, such as CPU type. Level.FINE, Level.FINER, Level.FINEST: three levels used for providing tracing information for the software developers. Level.OFF: turn off logging. Level.ALL: turn on all levels of logging.

      • connect

        void connect()
        Establishes connection to the Tello Drone.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnecting from the drone. If the drone is not landed yet, it will start an automatic landing.

      • enterCommandMode

        void enterCommandMode()
        Enter command mode. You can only execute commands after this call. Will determine and record drone model.

        Taking off from the ground.

      • goTo

        void goTo​(java.lang.Integer x,
          java.lang.Integer y,
          java.lang.Integer z,
          java.lang.Integer speed)
        Fly to these offsets from current position.
        Parameters:
        x - X axis offset (-500 to 500 cm).
        y - Y axis offset (-500 to 500 cm).
        z - Z axis offset (-500 to 500 cm).
        speed - Speed of movement (10 to 100 cm/s).

      • curve

        void curve​(java.lang.Integer x1,
           java.lang.Integer y1,
           java.lang.Integer z1,
           java.lang.Integer x2,
           java.lang.Integer y2,
           java.lang.Integer z2,
           java.lang.Integer speed)
        Fly at a curve starting at drone current position according to the two given offset coordinates at speed (cm/s). The first coordinate is the intermediate point on the curve and second is the end point of the curve. If the arc radius is not within a range of 0.5 to 10 meters, it will respond with an error. x, y and z values (cm) = -500 to +500, speed = 10 to 60. Note: x, y, and z values can't be set between -20 and +20 simultaneously.

      • flyRC

        void flyRC​(java.lang.Integer lr,
           java.lang.Integer fb,
           java.lang.Integer ud,
           java.lang.Integer yaw)
        Fly by remote control. Units are speed in cm/s.
        Parameters:
        lr - Left/Right (-100 to 100).
        fb - forward/backward (-100 to 100).
        ud - up/down (-100 to 100).
        yaw - yaw value in degrees.

      • getBattery

        int getBattery()
        Get current battery level.
        Returns:
        Battery level %.

      • getSpeed

        int getSpeed()
        Get current speed setting.
        Returns:
        Speed (1-100 cm/s).

      • getTime

        int getTime()
        Get flight time.
        Returns:
        Flight time in seconds.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Get drone height.
        Returns:
        Height (0-3000 cm).

      • getTemp

        int getTemp()
        Get drone temperature.
        Returns:
        Temperature in degrees C (0-90).

      • getBarometer

        double getBarometer()
        Get barometric pressure.
        Returns:
        Pressure in millibars.

      • getAttitude

        int[] getAttitude()
        Get IMU attitude data. Only valid when status monitoring enabled.
        Returns:
        Pitch, roll, yaw.

      • getAcceleration

        double[] getAcceleration()
        Get IMU acceleration. Only valid when status monitoring enabled.
        Returns:
        Angular acceleration x, y, z (.001 g).

      • getTof

        double getTof()
        Get distance from TOF.
        Returns:
        Distance (30-1000 cm).

      • getSN

        java.lang.String getSN()
        Get drone serial number. Requires EDU with SDK 1.3 or later.
        Returns:
        Serial Number.

      • getConnection

        TelloConnection getConnection()
        Get drone connection status.
        Returns:
        Connection status.

      • getSDK

        java.lang.String getSDK()
        Get drone sdk version. Requires EDU with SDK 1.3 or later.
        Returns:
        Version.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop drone motion, goes into hover.

      • emergency

        void emergency()
        Stop all motors.

      • streamOn

        void streamOn()
        Turn on video stream.

      • streamOff

        void streamOff()
        Turn off video stream.

      • startStatusMonitor

        void startStatusMonitor()
        Start monitoring the status updates sent by the Tello. Requires SDK 1.3 or later. Monitor will set drone connection state to disconnected if it detects loss of status updates. Monitor will also watch status data for crash indication and set drone connection state to disconnected.

      • stopStatusMonitor

        void stopStatusMonitor()
        Stop monitoring the status updates sent by the Tello. Requires SDK 1.3 or later. Monitor will also be stopped when disconnect() is called.

      • startKeepAlive

        void startKeepAlive()
        Start keep alive thread that pings the Tello every 10 seconds with a get battery level command to keep the Tello from shutting down automatically if it receives no commands for 15 seconds. Thread will set drone connection state to disconnected if it detects an error on ping of drone.

      • stopKeepAlive

        void stopKeepAlive()
        Stops the keep alive thread. Thread will also be stopped when disconnect() is called.

      • setMissionMode

        void setMissionMode​(boolean enabled,
                    MissionDetectionCamera camera)
        Set mission mode state. In mission mode, status monitoring will record information about any mission pad detected by the selected camera(s).
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable, false to disable.
        camera - Select which camera(s) used for detection when enabled.

      • setStationMode

        void setStationMode​(java.lang.String ssid,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Set drone into 'station' mode. Turns off access point and connects to WIFI access point.
        Parameters:
        ssid - Name of the access point.
        password - Password for the access point.
